Name: PersonLookup
Desc: Simulates a database lookup for a random person.

Keys.Name: Delay in Milliseconds
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to wait before making the next write?

Keys.Name: New Screen Delay in Milliseconds
Keys.Description: How many milliseconds to wait before writing in the new screen?

Keys.Name: Minimum names count
Keys.Description: Minimum amount of names to generate

Keys.Name: Maximum names count
Keys.Description: Maximum amount of names to generate

Keys.Name: Minimum age years count
Keys.Description: Minimum amount of age years to generate
